title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 98.4 - Conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 98.4 - Conditions

State Regulations

No opinion, letter of advice, or other communication by
the Authority shall be deemed a declaratory ruling unless it contains a
statement that it is a declaratory ruling or is issued in response to a
petition which complies with all of the conditions of section
98.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
98.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
